channel.title: How do i add a ::drops
channel.description:
ok i want to add a ::drops command on my server where it will tell you what drops what or something like an npc when you click on it it will tell you what drops what either way.
I need it for a 317 project insanity source by exion!

item.title: How do i add a ::drops
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

What your thinking of is something that would take longer to make, you can use the interface shown above and you can label each npc and you will have to put down their drops separate. To make a command to go through your drop system label the npc get the npc name and then find each item name by their id would take some time. It’d be easier to just do it by manually making either a separate command or a large command that will display each npc and their drops.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a ::drops
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

you see this line?

sendQuest("text", 8147);

see “text” ? this is your text.

find any command in your server and add it under or above it.
i suggest you add my code , then try it in game , and if it works , you go on and write some more text to it

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a ::drops

item.description:

i need like a full on guide m8 cuz idk where to put it and also idk where to add ::drops command either.

item.title: How do i add a ::drops
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

try making something out of this.

} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("drops") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@whi@Drops:", 8144); //Title sendQuest("NPC Drops", 8145); sendQuest("text", 8146); sendQuest("text", 8147); sendQuest("text", 8148); sendQuest("text", 8149); sendQuest("text", 8150); sendQuest("text", 8151); sendQuest("text", 8152); sendQuest("text", 8153); sendQuest("text", 8154); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("I Hope You Donate To Keep Server Up!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a ::drops
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

if (command.startsWith("getdropabbydemon")) { sM("Item: Abyssal Whip."); sM("Item: Ashes."); sM("Item: Coins."); sM("Item: Abunch of crazy shit."); } }

Something like that?
